Package RRPSS

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
RRPSS.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents the collection of menu items available in the restaurant.
Author:
Hans Farrell Soegeng

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu()
    Initializes the default menu of the restaurant, creating the default menu items and storing it in the 2D ArrayList.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    editMenu()
    Edits the menu with functionalities including adding a menu item to the menu, editing a menu item in the menu, removing a menu item from the menu, viewing the menu.
    ArrayList<ArrayList<MenuItem>>
    getMenu()
    Gets the 2D ArrayList storing the menu items collection.
    int
    getMenuItemIndex​(int i, String name)
    Gets the item number of a menu item in the category.
    String
    getMenuItemName​(int i, int j)
    Gets the name of the menu item in the menu.
    double
    getPrice​(int i, int j)
    Gets the price of a menu item in the menu.
    void
    printMenuItemAndPrice​(int i, int j)
    Prints out the name and price of a menu item in the menu.
    void
    viewMenu()
    Prints out all menu items and their information in the menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu()
      Initializes the default menu of the restaurant, creating the default menu items and storing it in the 2D ArrayList.

  • Method Details

    • getMenu

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<MenuItem>> getMenu()
      Gets the 2D ArrayList storing the menu items collection.
      Returns:
      NewMenu_ The 2D ArrayList storing the menu items collection.

    • viewMenu

      public void viewMenu()
      Prints out all menu items and their information in the menu.

    • editMenu

      public void editMenu()
      Edits the menu with functionalities including adding a menu item to the menu, editing a menu item in the menu, removing a menu item from the menu, viewing the menu.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice​(int i, int j)
      Gets the price of a menu item in the menu.
      Parameters:
      i - The category number of the menu item.
      j - The item number of the menu item in the category.
      Returns:
      The price of the menu item.

    • printMenuItemAndPrice

      public void printMenuItemAndPrice​(int i, int j)
      Prints out the name and price of a menu item in the menu.
      Parameters:
      i - The category number of the menu item.
      j - The item number of the menu item in the category.

    • getMenuItemIndex

      public int getMenuItemIndex​(int i, String name)
      Gets the item number of a menu item in the category.
      Parameters:
      i - The category number of the menu item.
      name - The name of the menu item.
      Returns:
      j The item number in the category, -1 if the item does not exist.

    • getMenuItemName

      public String getMenuItemName​(int i, int j)
      Gets the name of the menu item in the menu.
      Parameters:
      i - The category number of the menu item.
      j - The item number in the category.
      Returns:
      The name of the menu item.
